translation.en: ♪ Half shark, half dog Big fins, big jaws ♪
translation.zh: 一半鲨鱼 一半狗狗 大鱼鳍 大口鲨

translation.en: ♪ Loves the water, loves the park ♪ ♪ Sharkdog! ♪
translation.zh: 爱玩水 爱公园 鲨鱼狗！
夜晚视力难以置信

translation.en: ♪ He doesn't sleep, doesn't blink He sees you ♪
translation.zh: 从不睡觉 不眨眼 全看见！

translation.en: ♪ He's super strong and it's crazy ♪
translation.zh: 超级强壮 超乎想象

translation.en: ♪ He's the cutest land shark alive ♪
translation.zh: 最最可爱的陆地鲨

translation.en: ♪ Half shark, half dog Big fins, big jaws ♪
translation.zh: 一半鲨鱼 一半狗狗 大鱼鳍 大口鲨

translation.en: ♪ Loves the water, loves the park ♪ ♪ Sharkdog! ♪
translation.zh: 爱玩水 爱公园 鲨鱼狗！

translation.en: ♪ Half dog, half shark All friend, all heart ♪
translation.zh: 一半狗狗 一半鲨鱼结交好友 全心全意
鲨鱼狗！

translation.en: This is it. If Sharkdog can clinch this fifth strike in a row,
translation.zh: 就是这样如果鲨鱼狗能连续五次一击全中

translation.en: he'll get himself into the Foggy Springs Front Yard Bowling Hall of Fame!
translation.zh: 他就能荣登雾泉岛前院保龄球名人堂！
耶！
它成功了！耶！
鲨鱼狗是终极冠军！

translation.en: Hey, Sharkdog, so Mom's friend Mrs. MacGuffin is coming over today.
translation.zh: 嘿 鲨鱼狗妈妈的朋友麦加芬太太今天要过来
鲨鱼狗喜欢新朋友

translation.en: I know, but Mrs. MacGuffin is super allergic to dogs
translation.zh: 我知道 但麦加芬太太对狗狗和鲨鱼
大概还包括鲨鱼狗 会严重过敏

translation.en: So d'ya think you could maybe hang somewhere else today?
translation.zh: 所以你今天能不能到别的地方去玩？
鲨鱼狗不能进家？

translation.en: I'm sorry, it's just for a little bit! But hey, why not check out the dog park?
translation.zh: 对不起 就一会儿不过你为什么不去狗狗公园看看呢？

translation.en: -That might be fun. -Max come with Sharkdog?
translation.zh: -那里可能很好玩哦-迈克斯跟鲨鱼狗一起？
我去不了 伙计

translation.en: I need to help Mom and Mrs. MacGuffin with, um, something.
translation.zh: 我要帮妈妈和麦加芬太太做…点事

translation.en: But we should be done by noon, cool?
translation.zh: 但我们中午应该就能搞定了 好吗？
嗯 鲨鱼狗没问题
谢谢你 鲨鱼狗
你最棒了

translation.en: Can't believe I got roped into watching after the neighbors' dogs.
translation.zh: 真不敢相信我居然会被骗来照顾邻居们的狗狗
鲨鱼狗也玩？

translation.en: [sighs] I guess! What's one more slobber machine?
translation.zh: 我猜行吧 多一个流口水精怕什么？
鲨鱼狗
鲨鱼狗！
啵啵！
我想你应该没事 啵啵

translation.en: Probably was a bad idea to invite Sharkdog to the party.
translation.zh: 邀请鲨鱼狗一起玩也许是馊主意

translation.en: He's not a real dog after all.
translation.zh: 毕竟他又不是一只真正的狗狗
鲨鱼狗不是真狗狗
嘿 鲨鱼狗！你好吗？
鲨鱼狗不是迈克斯那样的人类
鲨鱼狗也不是真狗狗
不用担心 小家伙

translation.en: Maybe you just need to embrace your inner shark.
translation.zh: 也许你只是需要拥抱你内心的小鲨鱼
谢谢 安娜贝尔
不！
等等 别走 留下来 拜托！
鲨鱼狗不是真的鲨鱼
巴布？

translation.en: Sharkdog! I didn't see ya there!
translation.zh: 鲨鱼狗 我刚刚没看到你
巴布没事吧？

translation.en: Agh, I be feelin' pretty rudderless, to be honest with ye.
translation.zh: 老实说 我觉得非常无助

translation.en: I spent so much of me life trying to hunt down the infamous landshark,
translation.zh: 我此生花了这么多时间试图找到恶名昭彰的陆地鲨鱼

translation.en: and now that I found ye, I be lost, like a sailor without a compass.
translation.zh: 现在我找到了你 我觉得好迷茫就像一个没有罗盘的水手一样
鲨鱼狗让巴布难过了？

translation.en: No, it ain't like that. But I need to find me a new adventure!
translation.zh: 不 不是那样的但我得为自己寻找一段新的冒险

translation.en: I've tried everything, coin collecting, tap dancing,
translation.zh: 我什么都试过了收集硬币 踢踏舞 高温瑜伽

translation.en: hot yoga, late-night snorkeling, stand-up comedy,
translation.zh: 我什么都试过了收集硬币 踢踏舞 高温瑜伽 深夜浮潜 单口喜剧 快速钩针
深夜浮潜 单口喜剧 快速钩针

translation.en: I even got into makin' me own superfood smoothies.
translation.zh: 我甚至开始自己做超级食品奶昔了

translation.en: Ya don't look too ship shape yourself, matey? Ya feelin' okay?
translation.zh: 你看起来不太好 朋友 你还好吗？
鲨鱼狗不是人类
鲨鱼狗不是鲨鱼
鲨鱼狗不是狗狗
鲨鱼狗不属于任何地方
这样啊
我想我有办法了我想找一个新的冒险

translation.en: I seek a new adventure, and you be looking for where you belong. So…
translation.zh: 我想我有办法了我想找一个新的冒险 而你在寻找你的归宿 那么…
我们找到鲨鱼狗的归宿？ 没错

translation.en: Think hard, Sharkdog! -Do you remember where you came from? -[gasps]
translation.zh: 仔细想想 鲨鱼狗你还记得你从哪里来的吗？
鲨鱼狗记得

translation.en: The sea. That all Sharkdog remember.
translation.zh: 大海 鲨鱼狗只记得这些

translation.en: Arr. Really thought we were onto something there.
translation.zh: 我还以为我们找到目标了呢
中午了！鲨鱼狗找迈克斯
迈克斯！
迈克斯忘了鲨鱼狗？
惊喜！
欢迎回家 鲨鱼狗！

translation.en: After the crazy stuff you've gone through lately with Mr. Ceviche and all that,
translation.zh: 在你和塞维奇先生经历了那些疯狂的事情后

translation.en: we just wanted to show you how much we love ya.
translation.zh: 我们就希望让你知道我们有多爱你
真的吗？
但麦加芬太太在哪里？

translation.en: There is no Mrs. MacGuffin. We just needed to get you out of the house for a couple of hours
translation.zh: 没有什么麦加芬太太我们只是想让你离开家里几个小时

translation.en: so we could set up the surprise!
translation.zh: 这样我们才能准备惊喜啊

translation.en: And this little party is only the beginning,
translation.zh: 这个小派对只是开始哦因为我明天还计划好了一整天

translation.en: because I've got a whole Sharkdoggy day of fun stuff planned tomorrow!
translation.zh: 这个小派对只是开始哦因为我明天还计划好了一整天 乐趣无穷的鲨鱼狗活动呢
太棒啦！

translation.en: But Sharkdog have tough day today.
translation.zh: 但鲨鱼狗今天过得很煎熬

translation.en: Tough day? What d'ya mean, buddy?
translation.zh: 煎熬？什么意思 伙计？

translation.en: If Sharkdog only Sharkdog there is,
translation.zh: 如果鲨鱼狗是唯一的鲨鱼狗
哪里才是是鲨鱼狗的归宿？

translation.en: -[both gasp] -What? You're part of our family!
translation.zh: 什么？你是我们家的一员啊
这里就是你的归宿

translation.en: That's right. Even if you are the one-and-only Sharkdog,
translation.zh: 没错 哪怕你是唯一的鲨鱼狗
我们也不会介意的 真的吗？

translation.en: Aw, of course, Sharkdog! [Max] Fins or feet, you're one-of-a-kind.
translation.zh: -当然啦 鲨鱼狗-鱼鳍还是脚 你都是独一无二的

translation.en: And that's exactly what makes you so special.
translation.zh: 这正是你如此特别的原因
鲨鱼狗爱家人

translation.en: But maybe one day, Sharkdog know where Sharkdog come from.
translation.zh: 但也许某一天鲨鱼狗知道鲨鱼狗来自何方
鲨鱼狗日快乐 伙计！
-鲨鱼狗好开心！-今天你就是主角

translation.en: Today's all about you. We're gonna do everything that's Sharkdoggy!
translation.zh: -鲨鱼狗好开心！-今天你就是主角 我们要做遍所有鲨鱼狗爱做的事

translation.en: What we do? What? What? What?
translation.zh: 我们做什么？什么？

translation.en: We're gonna dive at the aquarium.
translation.zh: 我们要去水族馆潜水

translation.en: Then we're gonna hit the beach with Olly and Royce.
translation.zh: 然后跟奥莉和罗伊斯去海滩

translation.en: Then it's right back home for a big fish barbecue!
translation.zh: 然后回家来场丰盛的鱼鲜烧烤
鱼鱼好棒！

translation.en: No! The fish for the barbecue! I totally forgot to pick it up from Barb!
translation.zh: 烧烤用的鱼！我完全忘记去巴布那里拿了

translation.en: Aw, Dad! We can't have Sharkdog day without fish!
translation.zh: 爸爸 鲨鱼狗日可不能没有鱼
迈克斯 别急 鲨鱼狗拿鱼
真的吗？ 谢谢 鲨鱼狗你最棒了 我们在水族馆见！

translation.en: You're the best! We'll meet you at the aquarium!
translation.zh: 谢谢 鲨鱼狗你最棒了 我们在水族馆见！
鲨鱼狗！

translation.en: Just the beast! Talkin' with ye yesterday inspired me to plan a brand new adventure!
translation.zh: 我正想找你呢 昨天和你的谈话激发了我计划新冒险的灵感！
鲨鱼狗需要鱼
没问题 但首先 我通过电波

translation.en: ye see, I be listening to me ol' radio, when through the air waves
translation.zh: 没问题 但首先 我通过电波 听我的旧收音机时我听到报道说雾泉岛的沿岸

translation.en: I heard reports of strange things going on,
translation.zh: 听我的旧收音机时我听到报道说雾泉岛的沿岸

translation.en: off the coast o' Foggy Springs.
translation.zh: 发生了奇怪的事情

translation.en: Reports of a secret island -and even mysterious new creatures! -[squeaking]
translation.zh: 关于神秘岛和神秘新生物的报道
新鲨鱼狗？
有可能 不幸的是 几年前 我把神秘岛的秘密地图藏在了一个超隐秘的地方

translation.en: I hid me secret map of secret islands somewhere so secret,
translation.zh: 不幸的是 几年前 我把神秘岛的秘密地图藏在了一个超隐秘的地方
结果我忘记是在哪里了

translation.en: So, will ye help me find it?
translation.zh: 你会帮我把它找出来吗？

translation.en: Sharkdog find map, Sharkdog find secret island,
translation.zh: 鲨鱼狗找到地图 鲨鱼狗找到神秘岛
鲨鱼狗找到更多鲨鱼狗
好 鲨鱼狗找到地图

translation.en: [chuckles] Good to have ye on board!
translation.zh: 很高兴有你加入

translation.en: I'll keep searching here, and you go search the Freezer room and the beach!
translation.zh: 我继续在这里找你去冰柜和海滩找找吧
好
不是地图
不是地图
不是地图
不是地图

translation.en: [groans] Not map! Not map! Not map!
translation.zh: 不是地图！
糟了 鱼！迈克斯！

translation.en: -[grunting] -You're back! -[Max] What took so long? -[pants] Sharkdog gotta tell Max something!
translation.zh: -你回来了 怎么这么久？-鲨鱼狗有事要告诉迈克斯

translation.en: Can it wait, bud? I kinda planned all this fun stuff for Sharkdog day,
translation.zh: 能晚点吗 伙计？我为鲨鱼狗日计划了很多有趣的活动

translation.en: and we've already been waiting for you a while!
translation.zh: 而我们已经等你好一阵了
好吧 鲨鱼狗和迈克斯潜水！
鱼鱼！
鱼鱼朋友
新鲨鱼狗
潜水好玩 迈克斯海滩见
回来 鲨鱼狗！

translation.en: Sharkdog find map, Sharkdog find island, Sharkdog find more Sharkdog!
translation.zh: 鲨鱼狗找到地图 鲨鱼狗找到岛鲨鱼狗找到更多鲨鱼狗

translation.en: -There's our lil' Shark dude! -[gasps] Where'd you go? You just ran off!
translation.zh: -我们的鲨鱼小伙伴在那里呢-你去哪里了？你忽然就跑了

translation.en: Uh, Sharkdog gotta tell Max-- Tell me what, bud?
translation.zh: -鲨鱼狗得告诉迈克斯…-告诉我什么 伙计？

translation.en: How we're gonna totally crush Olly and Royce at ultimate mega disc toss?
translation.zh: 我们会如何在终极飞盘游戏中让奥莉和罗伊斯溃不成军吗？
是我们让你们一败涂地吧
嘿 鲨鱼狗！接住！
不是地图
不是地图
鲨鱼狗！

translation.en: -[groans] -Are you okay? And what's with all these holes?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？这些洞是怎么回事？
不是地图
不是什么 伙计？
不浪费时间 海滩有趣 现在回家
不浪费时间 海滩有趣 现在回家 我不明白 他为什么这么奇怪？
我不明白 他为什么这么奇怪？

translation.en: -I mean, it is kinda fun! -[both gasp]
translation.zh: 这还挺有趣的

translation.en: [Barb] Argh! You're back! -Any luck finding me map? -[groans]
translation.zh: 你回来了 找到我的地图了吗？

translation.en: Come on! Come aboard and help me search me boat.
translation.zh: 快来！上来帮我一起在船上找找
嘘
不！
我了个海神电动剃须刀啊！
这会是吗？

translation.en: -[chuckling] -Where is Sharkdog? Don't you think he's been acting kinda strange all day?
translation.zh: 鲨鱼狗去哪里了？你们不觉得他一整天都怪怪的吗？

translation.en: Don't worry, Max, I'm sure he's just fine.
translation.zh: 别担心 迈克斯 我相信他没事的
快来人拦住那只逃跑的鲨鱼狗！

translation.en: All I wanted was a fun day with Sharkdog.
translation.zh: 我只是想和鲨鱼狗好好开心玩耍

translation.en: But now he's not even here to eat this mountain of fish!
translation.zh: 但他现在甚至都没来吃这座鱼山

translation.en: Chill out, Max, he'll drop by soon!
translation.zh: 冷静点 迈克斯 他很快就会来的
鲨鱼狗？
鲨鱼狗！
鲨鱼狗对不起

translation.en: Sharkdog want fun day with Max, but Sharkdog also want find map.
translation.zh: 鲨鱼狗想和迈克斯玩但鲨鱼狗也想找到地图
是 我知道 伙计
巴布全都告诉我们了

translation.en: When ye took off in me boat, I followed ye right back here!
translation.zh: 你从我的船上冲出来时我跟着你回到了这里

translation.en: If Sharkdog find map, Sharkdog find Secret island.
translation.zh: 如果鲨鱼狗找到地图鲨鱼狗找到神秘岛
鲨鱼狗找到更多鲨鱼狗
等一下 更多鲨鱼狗？

translation.en: Uh, that's not exactly what I said.
translation.zh: 我不是这么说的
但谁知道呢？

translation.en: -It is a secret island after all. -[all gasp] Then we gotta find this map!
translation.zh: -那毕竟是座神秘岛-那我们就必须得找到这张地图了

translation.en: -No need! I already found it. -[all gasp]
translation.zh: 不用了 我已经找到了

translation.en: Or at least Sharkdog did when he was scrabbling around on me boat!
translation.zh: 或者说是鲨鱼狗在我的船上到处乱爬时找到的
什么？
一片空白
地图的事 我很遗憾 鲨鱼狗

translation.en: It must have been hidden in Barb's boat so long it just faded away.
translation.zh: 肯定是在巴布的船上藏得太久所以褪色了

translation.en: I guess now we'll never find the secret island.
translation.zh: 我猜现在我们永远都找不到神秘岛了

translation.en: Or know if there are any more Sharkdogs out there.
translation.zh: 也没法弄清楚世上还有没有其他鲨鱼狗了
没有更多鲨鱼狗了

translation.en: I'm sorry, bud. But no matter what happens, you'll always have me.
translation.zh: 真抱歉 伙计但无论如何 我都会在你身边的
-还有我-还有我
-加油 鲨鱼小分队！-加油 鲨鱼小分队！

translation.en: [Max] Well, Sharkdog, I know you're still a little down about the whole map thing,
translation.zh: （剧名：暗夜鳍影） 鲨鱼狗 我知道你还在为地图的事不开心

translation.en: which is why we're gonna have… the ultimate sleepover monster movie,
translation.zh: 所以我们才要看这部终极留宿聚会怪兽电影

translation.en: Dawn of the Return of the Living Man-Beast [all] From Space!
translation.zh: 《从太空归来的在世人兽之黎明》
嘿 孩子们！

translation.en: Whoa, are those Mom's ooey gooey chewy chocolate bites?
translation.zh: 那些是妈妈的黏糊糊可口巧克力点心吗？
那些是妈妈的黏糊糊可口巧克力点心吗？ -是啊 你要吃吗 爸爸？-我不能吃
-是啊 你要吃吗 爸爸？-我不能吃

translation.en: I've gotta stay in tip-top shape now that I'm gonna be running the Aquarium full-time.
translation.zh: 现在我要全职管理水族馆了所以我要保持最佳状态

translation.en: The diet and workout regimen start tonight!
translation.zh: 节食和锻炼计划从今晚开始！
这个声音可不妙

translation.en: -Sharkdog can't wait for movie! -You sure about that, Sharkdog?
translation.zh: -鲨鱼狗等不及电影了-你确定吗 鲨鱼狗？

translation.en: Because I heard Dawn of the Return of the Living Man-Beast… [all] From Space!
translation.zh: 因为我听说《从太空归来的在世人兽之黎明》
非常恐怖哦
鲨鱼狗才不怕呢

translation.en: He's the bravest guard dog ever!
translation.zh: 他是有史以来最勇敢的守卫犬对吧 鲨鱼狗？
他是有史以来最勇敢的守卫犬对吧 鲨鱼狗？ 对 鲨鱼狗勇敢 鲨鱼狗从不害怕
对 鲨鱼狗勇敢 鲨鱼狗从不害怕

translation.en: -Well then, let's get to it! -[TV beeps] -No, no, no! -[growls]
translation.zh: -那我们开始吧-不！
我是说…

translation.en: Eat closet, ya Man Beast thing -from space! -[clattering]
translation.zh: 吃柜子吧 你这个从太空来的人兽！
也没那么可怕嘛

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, yeah. Sharkdog so not scared.
translation.zh: 对 鲨鱼狗一点都不怕
我猜到时间睡觉了
对
晚安

translation.en: [gasps] What was that? It sounded like it was coming from downstairs.
translation.zh: -那是什么？-听起来好像是从楼下传来的

translation.en: I mean, whatever it is, I'm not scared or nothin'.
translation.zh: 话说 不管它是什么 我一点都不害怕

translation.en: Of course not! There's no such thing as monsters,
translation.zh: 当然啦 世界上根本没有怪兽 对吧？
当然啦 世界上根本没有怪兽 对吧？ 就现代科学而言 怪兽并不存在

translation.en: as far as modern science is concerned, monsters don't exist.
translation.zh: 就现代科学而言 怪兽并不存在

translation.en: Still, it might call for some further investigation.
translation.zh: 但也许还需要进一步的研究

translation.en: I'd go, but, uh, I'm still recovering from a soccer injury.
translation.zh: 我很想去看看但我踢球受的伤还没好

translation.en: I can't go either, I just, uh, put my retainer in. See?
translation.zh: 我也去不了 我刚戴上了牙套 看吧？

translation.en: -[Sharkdog whines] -I would so do it, but, uh, Sharkdog's totally got this, right, bud?
translation.zh: 我也很乐意去但鲨鱼狗完全能代劳的 对吧 伙计？
-我？-当然啦 鲨鱼狗
-我？-当然啦 鲨鱼狗 好主意

translation.en: Like I said before, he's the bravest guard dog ever!
translation.zh: 就像我之前说的他是有史以来最勇敢的守卫犬

translation.en: And he's like half shark! -Sharkdog's totally got this! -[chuckling]
translation.zh: 而且他有一半的鲨鱼血统鲨鱼狗绝对能完成任务

translation.en: Super brave and tough! That's… -[door thuds] -[sighs] …Sharkdog. [grunts]
translation.zh: 超级勇敢且坚强 这正是…鲨鱼狗
不 鲨鱼狗勇敢
鲨鱼狗勇敢 鲨鱼狗…
鲨鱼狗不勇敢！
鲨鱼狗一点都不勇敢！

translation.en: -[whining continues] -Sharkdog? Are you okay? What is it?
translation.zh: 鲨鱼狗？你没事吧？什么情况？
你看到了什么？

translation.en: Sharkdog saw monster! With octopus arms, and spiky head,
translation.zh: 鲨鱼狗看到章鱼手和尖脑袋的怪兽
还有…鲨鱼狗不勇敢
鲨鱼狗对不起

translation.en: [sighs] Sharkdog. It's okay to be scared.
translation.zh: 鲨鱼狗 就算害怕也没关系
-你不必总是很勇敢的-真的吗？

translation.en: Yeah! In fact, I'm kinda scared too.
translation.zh: 是啊 其实 我也有点害怕

translation.en: If we're being honest, I was also a tiny bit, absolutely terrified.
translation.zh: 老实说 我也有一点点胆颤心寒

translation.en: I dunno what you guys are talking about, I wasn't scared at all.
translation.zh: 我不知道你们在说些什么我一点都不害怕
好吧 我怕得要命

translation.en: I'm sorry, bud. I should've never asked you to go alone in the first place.
translation.zh: 抱歉 伙计 我一开始就不该让你自己独自面对的

translation.en: If we wanna stop this monster, we gotta do it together!
translation.zh: 如果想阻止这个怪兽我们就要一起行动
鲨鱼狗一起勇敢
耶
你先走

translation.en: No way! You go first, Max.
translation.zh: 不行 你先走 迈克斯
你先走 鲨鱼狗
不 迈克斯 你先走

translation.en: -[Royce] You go first! -[Aleki] No, after you!
translation.zh: -你先走-不 你先吧

translation.en: It's just the giggling gizmo! -There's nothing to be scared about-- -[thunder crashes]
translation.zh: 只是一个逗乐的小玩意没什么可怕的…
鲨鱼狗害怕
但如果一起面对怪兽就会勇敢
一起
-一起！-一起！
我们该怎么办？

translation.en: [grunts] Sharkdog! Remember what they did in the movie?
translation.zh: 鲨鱼狗！记得他们在电影里是怎么做的吗？

translation.en: Eat closet, ya Man Beast thing from space!
translation.zh: 吃衣柜吧 你这个从太空来的人兽！
等等 那不是怪兽
爸爸？
-大家好啊-这是怎么回事？

translation.en: So things got a little out of control during my workout.
translation.zh: 我锻炼的时候情况有些不受控制

translation.en: [Dad] First, I got coiled up in these exercise bands.
translation.zh: 刚开始 我被这些训练弹力带捆得动弹不得

translation.en: And then when I tried untangling myself… [sighs]
translation.zh: 后来 我尝试解开弹力带时

translation.en: …that bucket of popcorn got stuck on my head.
translation.zh: 爆米花桶卡在我的头上了

translation.en: I hope I didn't lick up any extra calories.
translation.zh: 希望我没有吞下超额的卡路里

translation.en: See, Sharkdog, what'd I tell ya? There's no such thing as monsters!
translation.zh: 看吧 鲨鱼狗？我说什么啦？世界上没有什么怪兽

translation.en: -Yeah, yeah! -[Mom] What is going on down here?
translation.zh: -对-下面发生什么事了啊？
怪兽！
没礼貌
